about_the_game: Cozy on down by the fire, grab a cup of wine (unless you’re a kid), and settle in for a trip down nostalgia lane, as you get BLASTED by the CALMING OST of Rogue Legacy.  Composed by A Shell in the Pit and Tettix, all proceeds go to the composers, but all your kind words will be read by the developers.   All songs come in MP3 format along with a lossless high quality WAV version.
